objects.name: gameover
objects.string:
Don't Touch the squares.
You will lose poitns!!!

objects.name: WelcomeMesage
objects.string:
Hey there, welcome to "Get out". 
This game is about getting out of square city as fast as possible.

objects.name: FinishLine
objects.string: The Blue dot thats the finish dot!!!

objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Get to the blue dot by avoiding the squares in the shortest time.

            For every collision you have you lose points.

      You are allowed a maximum of 3 collisions in each level.

               Use the arrow keys to control the red dot. 

        You can start as soon as this message is destroyed.
